column6: TURNING JAPANESE! Ever since she got a claw of her own, Kitty Pryde's been feeling ...not herself. To put it mildly. And after barely surviving an encounter with the Marauders' secret weapon, the young X-Man feels a strange, inexplicable pull towards the land of the rising sun. Of course, it can't be a coincidence that said secret weapon is also stalking the streets of Tokyo, right?  It's gonna take more than just one claw for Kitty to make it through round two!! Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Vero Gandini | penciller:Mike Grell | penciller:Tom Grummett
